page.title: 10Population of Whiteparish
page.content: {1985-approx. 1000 adults}within the parish boundaries.After many years of, "strip-development", it is recognised as not being in the best interest of the area.The{SOUTH WILTSHIRE STRUCTURE {PLAN}has designated W/p.as a village which should grow. Up to 125 new properties will be built between 1975 & 1991-some small estates presently being built. Many original village houses bought by ,"newcomers," in the last 20 yrs. The next 20 will probably see us mainly populated by retired or commuting families. Because of the {lack of support of public transport a completely different method of servicing our community will probably replace the large 'bus companies. (The co-operation of Mr. J.Metcalfe, Whiteparish Council Chairman,is gratefully acknowledged in the preparation of this page.)
